data.description:
Welcome to Bullet Style! An all-new roomscale virtual reality shooter that immerses players in action-packed gunfights using real movement. Become the action hero of your dreams and experience intense combat by navigating seemingly endless levels with your own two feet. Blast bad guys with an extensive arsenal of weaponry, fend off hordes of zombies, and play through a variety of different game modes that keep the adrenaline pumping!

Bullet Style requires a minimum of 6.5 feet by 6.5 feet to be played with real movement. A larger play area will improve the game experience. Thumbstick controls can be enabled for stationary play, but this is not recommended.

Bullet Style is currently in early access and may contain bugs or other issues. Please report any bugs to contact@adventurousstudios.com.

changelog.change_log:
- Fixed bug with loadout system causing limited space in equipment sockets
- Fixed bug with stun grenade reference causing issues
- Updated tutorial and menu backgrounds
- Added first time start cinematic
- Increased frag effect radius
- Improved plastic explosive effect

Updated Outpost level with all-new environment, improved wave spawning logic to allow for increased numbers of enemies for Onslaught and Infection modes, fixed bug related to enemy aim when initially noticing player
Changed colour of lasers and optics to green to better contrast with enemies, minor bug fixes and improvements
Fixed bug related to attachments and loadout that caused crashing and other issues, other minor bug fixes and improvements
Fixed visual glitches with several weapons, minor bug fixes and improvements
Improved visuals for Shoothouse level including modifications to level environment and background, fixed visual glitches in Nightclub level
